channel.title: When training range it freezes~!
channel.description: When i'm training range it's something to do with the lower bows like oak and shortbow ect.. nothing with magic or dark bow

item.title: When training range it freezes~!
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:552570”][quote author=tank nation link=topic=671486.msg4490532#msg4490532 date=1437530224]

Most freezing errors will display a nullpointer or similar in the client… Showing us that may help.

My guess: The animations you’re using for the bows are wrong.

i’ma say it’s the arrows all bows seem to work fine but here is the error i’m getting.
[/quote]
That does not change anything I said.
Like every single bow (With the exception of the dark bows special, and maybe it’s normal fire anim) use the same or close to the exact same animation to fire…
So perhaps if that animation is incorrect, it could be causing a null pointer…[/quote]

Where is the fire animation located? I looked through both sources and they all seem to have the same thing between the bows ect… this crash also happens when it comes to knifes!

Read full topic

item.title: When training range it freezes~!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“tank nation, post:3, topic:552570”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=671486.msg4490514#msg4490514 date=1437520416]
Most freezing errors will display a nullpointer or similar in the client… Showing us that may help.

My guess: The animations you’re using for the bows are wrong.
[/quote]

i’ma say it’s the arrows all bows seem to work fine but here is the error i’m getting.[/quote]
That does not change anything I said.
Like every single bow (With the exception of the dark bows special, and maybe it’s normal fire anim) use the same or close to the exact same animation to fire…
So perhaps if that animation is incorrect, it could be causing a null pointer…

Read full topic
